about_the_game:
A realistic management experience

Every aspect of the game is designed to be as true to the real esports world as possible. From negotiating contracts with players to making complex tactical decisions during a match.

Team management

Be in charge of one of the existing teams or create your own from scratch. Choose its logo, jersey, color combination and build a team that will become a legend by winning a Major.

Real tournaments and formats

The game features authentic tournament formats and rules, letting you feel what it’s like to win the most prestigious events in the world.

Tactics, training and morale

Different maps will require different approach so your job is to find the best strategy for each match.

Live match simulation

Use timeouts, change tactics and make key decisions that can turn the game in your favour.

Negotiate with players and team members

With detailed contract negotiations between players and teams, you have plenty of options to sign your dream player.

Facilities

Upgrade different parts of teams facilities. The higher their level, the bigger the bonuses you'll receive. However, everything costs time and money, so plan your moves carefully.

Manage finances

Take care of the financial health of your team. Negotiate lucrative sponsorship deals that allow you to invest in better players, better training and your facilities.

Contingencies

Prepare for unexpected situations that can affect your team and your plans. Injuries to players, unexpected team changes or extra financial expenses can all complicate your path to the top.

Become the manager of your dream team and lead them to glory in Esport Manager: Road to Major. Your success depends on your decisions – are you ready to take on the challenge and become the next Major winner?

short_description: This realistic management game puts you in control of an FPS esports team, where every decision you make could be the key to victory or defeat. You'll be responsible for planning strategies, analyzing, creating tactics, negotiating contracts, managing finances, building facilities, and much more.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Czech
*languages with full audio support
